ing: 1 (6 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, with juice
des: "This is great drink on a hot day. Careful as they can sneak up on you!! You can add just about any type of fruit!!"
ins: Dissolve confectioners' sugar in the rum in a gallon size glass jar. Add the cherries, oranges, lemons, and limes. Fill the jar with ice, and screw on the lid; shake until the mixture is very cold.
